mapper.select: SELECT pjt_seq AS sequence , pjt_addr_id AS addressId , pjt_nm AS name , ( SELECT user_nm FROM t_user WHERE user_id = p.pjt_mgr ) AS managerName FROM t_pjt p ORDER BY p.pjt_seq DESC

SELECT a.* FROM ( SELECT ( SELECT pjt_seq FROM t_pjt WHERE pjt_addr_id = tpu.pjt_addr_id ) AS sequence , ( SELECT pjt_addr_id FROM t_pjt WHERE pjt_addr_id = tpu.pjt_addr_id ) AS addressId , ( SELECT pjt_nm FROM t_pjt WHERE pjt_addr_id = tpu.pjt_addr_id ) AS name , ( SELECT ( SELECT user_nm FROM t_user WHERE user_id = p.pjt_mgr ) FROM t_pjt p WHERE p.pjt_addr_id = tpu.pjt_addr_id ) AS managerName , ( SELECT role_nm FROM t_role WHERE role_cd = tpu.user_role ) AS myRole FROM t_pjt_user tpu WHERE tpu.user_id = #{userId} ) a ORDER BY a.sequence DESC
